description.short: Make it easy for L&D teams to create and manage events to enagage employees.
description.full: Engage your employees with training where they spend most of their time-right here in Microsoft Teams. Your Learning + Development team can create new training events, specify who can attend and whether the event is mandatory or not, and close registration once capacity is reached. Built-in reminders help ensure your events are well attended.
staticTabs[0].name: Manage events
